channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Did xAI lie about Grok 3’s benchmarks?
item.description: Debates over AI benchmarks — and how they’re reported by AI labs — are spilling out into public view. This week, an OpenAI employee accused Elon Musk’...

item.title: Layer Your Clothes to Stay Comfortable in Any Weather (2025)
item.description: Learn how to use base layers, mid layers, and a shell to be comfortable no matter what nature throws at you.

item.title: US AI Safety Institute could face big cuts

item.title: Elon Musk Threatens FBI Agents and Air Traffic Controllers With Forced Resignation If They Don't Respond to an Email
item.description: Employees throughout the federal government have until 11:59pm ET Monday to detail five things they accomplished in the last week.

item.title: How I Podcast: Summer Album / Winter Album’s Jody Avirgan
item.description: The beauty of podcasting is that anyone can do it. It’s a rare medium that’s nearly as easy to make as it is to consume. And as such, no two people do...

item.title: The pain of discontinued items, and the thrill of finding them online
item.description: We’ve all been there. A favorite item is suddenly unavailable for purchase. Couldn’t the manufacturer have given you advance warning? Whether owing to...

item.title: The Best Meta Quest Games You Can Play Right Now (2025)
item.description: Dipping your toes into virtual reality? From shooters to woodsy adventures, these are our favorites to play by yourself or with friends.

item.title: 12 Best Wi-Fi Routers of 2025, Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Don’t suffer the buffer. These WIRED-tested systems will deliver reliable internet across your home, whatever your needs or budget.
